biotools.summary: scAMACE (integrative Analysis of single-cell Methylation, chromatin ACcessibility, and gene Expression). Python implementation (both CPU and GPU version) to a model-based approach to the joint analysis of single-cell data on chromatin accessibility, gene expression and methylation.
